data.title: Erik Thomas, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Erik Thomas stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Erik Thomas - Points

Erik Thomas scores a career high 36 points (2020)

On October 03, 2020, Erik Thomas set his career high in points in a Mexico - Liga SISNova LNBP game. That day he scored 36 points in Soles de Mexicali's road win against Abejas de León, 86-89. He also had 4 assists, 5 steals. He shot 7/10 from two, 5/6 from three, shooting at 75.0% from the field. He also shot 7/7 from the free-throw line.

Erik Thomas - Rebounds

Erik Thomas grabs a career high 16 rebounds (2022)

On April 08, 2022, Erik Thomas set his career high in rebounds in a Brazil - NBB game. That day he grabbed 16 rebounds in BRB/Brasília's road win against Cerrado, 86-90. He also had 16 points, 4 assists, 1 steal and 1 block.

Erik Thomas - Assists

Erik Thomas gives a career high 11 assists (2022)

On February 09, 2022, Erik Thomas set his career high in assists in a Brazil - NBB game. That day he dished 11 assists in BRB/Brasília's home win against União Corinthia, 92-71. He also had 11 points, 6 rebounds, 3 steals.

Erik Thomas - Steals

Erik Thomas has a career high 5 steals (2019)

On April 21, 2019, Erik Thomas tied his career high in steals in a Argentina - Liga A game. That day he reached 5 steals in Deportivo Libertad Sunchales's home win against Hispano Am., 87-72. He also had 21 points, 9 rebounds and 2 assists.

Erik Thomas - Blocks

Erik Thomas blocks a career high 3 shots (2019)

On March 16, 2019, Erik Thomas set his career high in blocks in a Argentina - Liga A game. That day he went for 3 blocks in Deportivo Libertad Sunchales's road loss against Comunicaciones, 84-75. He also had 15 points, 11 rebounds and 2 assists.

Erik Thomas - Efficiency

Erik Thomas records a career high 41 efficiency rating (2020)

On October 03, 2020, Erik Thomas set his career high in efficiency in a Mexico - Liga SISNova LNBP game. That day he accomplished 41 efficiency in Soles de Mexicali's road win against Abejas de León, 86-89. He also had 36 points and 4 assists.
